name: Broom Bot Battle
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 37

What do robot vacuums do when you're not home? They have sumo wrestling matches on the rug of course!

-The goal is simple. Bump all of the other players off the mat.

-Play with up to 8 players (2 per controller)

-Play at full screen for best experience

THEME: One Room

ENGINE: Unity

ART: Photo Shop

SOCIAL MEDIA

Twitter: @A_W_Apps

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/awappsut

Website: http://www.a-w-apps.com
